possible - Open source so anyone can audit its security Cons: - Can't sync 
old messages to new devices - Can't backup encryption for 
switching/resetting devices; contacts always get warned of safety numbers 
changing - Can't encrypt SMS messages - Group chats have almost no 
management features - Main developer's hostility towards alternative 
clients and federation makes me wonder why they release the source in the

to fostering a community of contributors, the ability to backup and restore 
app data, and more features in general.
